Question
========

What is the correct description of statistical interaction? 
Answerlist
----------
* The effect of $X_{1}$ on $Y$ changes as the value of $X_{2}$ changes.
* The effect of $X_{1}$ on $Y$ disappears if the value of $X_{2}$ is held constant.
* The effect of $X_{1}$ appears on $Y$ if the value of $X_{2}$ is held constant.
* The effect of $X_{1}$ at $Y$ changes sign if the value of $X_{2}$ is kept constant.


Solution
========

Answerlist
----------
* Correct
* Incorrect
* Incorrect
* Incorrect
